title: When Weight Loss Starts to Feel Hard
itunes:title: When Weight Loss Starts to Feel Hard
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

After the NEW wears off, your diet starts to feel HARD.

It's two weeks after New Years and you've lost interest in your latest diet plan. Welcome to Stage Two - the stage of your weight loss journey that feels like crap. It feels hard, you hate it, you just want to eat. You've lost the excitement and you've lost site of your goals.

In this podcast, we talk about the four stages of weight loss and how to move from one stage to the next.
